Description: We are hiring an Estimation & QS Engineer for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 5 years of experience in pre & post-construction and quantity surveying services, 3 years of which should be in GCC.
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or equivalent.
A Qatar driver's license is preferred.
Nationality: Indian/Filipino/Sri Lankan
A male candidate is required
Age: 45 years old and below
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
